General.Name: Wuxi Autowell Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuxi Autowell Technology Co.,Ltd. research, develops, and manufactures automation equipment in China. The company offers photovoltaic equipment; lithium battery equipment; and semiconductor. It also provides welding, wafer sorting, and laser scribing machines. In addition, the company offers screen printing line, light injection annealing furnace, single crystal furnace, and other photovoltaic equipment. Further, it provides cylindrical cells, power modules, PACK lines, and other lithium battery equipment. The company's products are used in semiconductor packaging and aluminum wire bonding machines. Wuxi Autowell Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is based in Wuxi, China.
